queries.queryString:
{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.triggerGranularity" as granularity
| json field=_raw "details.alertDuration" as duration nodrop
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorPath" as path

| if (isnull(duration),"0",duration ) as duration
| replace(duration," ms","") as duration
| round(duration / (1000 * 60)) as duration
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
//| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as oldstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| replace(timeseries,/_violations=.+/,"") as timeseries| sort _messagetime 
| first(status) as last_state,count as events, count_distinct(timeseries) as series, values(status) as statuses,avg(duration) as avg_duration, max (duration) as max_duration by monitorid,path,granularity 
| sort events

{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.triggerGranularity" as granularity
| json field=_raw "details.alertDuration" as duration nodrop

| if (isnull(duration),"0",duration ) as duration
| replace(duration," ms","") as duration
| round(duration / 1000) as duration
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorPath" as path
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| replace(timeseries,/_violations=.+/,"") as timeseries
| sort _messagetime 
| values(status) as statuses,first(_messagetime) as updated,first(status) as status by path,timeseries,granularity
| where status !="Normal"
| sort updated | formatdate(updated,"yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as updated
//
//

panels.title: Triggered Monitors Resolved In Time Range

queries.queryString:
{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.triggerGranularity" as granularity
| json field=_raw "details.alertDuration" as duration nodrop
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorPath" as path
| if (isnull(duration),"0",duration ) as duration
| replace(duration," ms","") as duration
| round(duration / 1000) as duration
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as oldstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| replace(timeseries,/_violations=.+/,"") as timeseries
| sort _messagetime 
| first(oldstatus) as oldstatus,first(_messagetime) as updated,first(status) as status,first(duration) as duration by path,timeseries,granularity
| where status ="Normal"
| sort updated | formatdate(updated,"yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as updated

_index=sumologic_audit_events  MonitorsLibraryItemUpdated {{{filter}}}
| json field=_raw "to.isDisabled" as isDisabled
| json field=_raw "to.name" as name
| json field=_raw "from.isDisabled" as wasDisabled
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as user
| json field=_raw "operator.sourceIp" as src_ip
| json field=_raw "from.monitorType" as monitortype
| where isdisabled !=wasdisabled
| _messagetime as time
| count by time,isDisabled,wasDisabled,name,user,src_ip,monitortype | fields -_count
| sort time
| formatdate(tolong(time),"YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as time

_index=sumologic_audit_events MonitorsLibraryItemUpdated {{{filter}}}
| json field=_raw "to.isDisabled" as isDisabled nodrop
| json field=_raw "to.name" as name nodrop
| json field=_raw "from.isDisabled" as wasDisabled nodrop
| json field=_raw "operator.email" as user
| json field=_raw "operator.sourceIp" as src_ip
| json field=_raw "from.monitorType" as monitortype
| json field=_raw "to" as new_config
| _messagetime as time
| count by time,name,user,src_ip,monitortype,new_config | fields -_count
| sort time
| formatdate(tolong(time),"YYYY-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as time

{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.triggerGranularity" as granularity
| json field=_raw "details.alertDuration" as duration nodrop

| if (isnull(duration),"0",duration ) as duration
| replace(duration," ms","") as duration
| round(duration / 1000) as duration
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| replace(timeseries,/_violations=.+/,"") as timeseries
| sort _messagetime 
| values(status) as statuses,first(_messagetime) as updated,first(status) as status by monitorid,name,timeseries,granularity
| where status ="Critical"
| count

_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid

| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.triggerGranularity" as granularity
| json field=_raw "details.alertDuration" as duration nodrop

| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop

{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.triggerGranularity" as granularity
| json field=_raw "details.alertDuration" as duration nodrop

| if (isnull(duration),"0",duration ) as duration
| replace(duration," ms","") as duration
| round(duration / 1000) as duration
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| replace(timeseries,/_violations=.+/,"") as timeseries| sort _messagetime 
| values(status) as statuses,first(_messagetime) as updated,first(status) as status by monitorid,name,timeseries,granularity
| where status matches "*Data"
| count

{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.triggerGranularity" as granularity
| json field=_raw "details.alertDuration" as duration nodrop

| if (isnull(duration),"0",duration ) as duration
| replace(duration," ms","") as duration
| round(duration / 1000) as duration
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorPath" as path
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| replace(timeseries,/_violations=.+/,"") as timeseries
| _messagetime as time
| tourl(concat("https://","{{sumo_url}}",".sumologic.com/ui/#/alert/",resourceid),resourceid) as resourceid
| count by time ,status,path,resourceid,name,timeseries,granularity,duration | fields -_count
| sort time
| formatdate(time,"yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss ZZZZ") as time
|ceil(duration / 60) as %"Duration (Min)" | fields -duration

{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.triggerGranularity" as granularity
| json field=_raw "details.alertDuration" as duration nodrop

| if (isnull(duration),"0",duration ) as duration
| replace(duration," ms","") as duration
| round(duration / 1000) as duration
| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| replace(timeseries,/_violations=.+/,"") as timeseries| sort _messagetime 
| values(status) as statuses,first(_messagetime) as updated,first(status) as status by monitorid,duration
| where status ="Normal"
| duration/ 60 as %"Duration (Min)" | avg(%"Duration (Min)" ) as %"Avg Duration (Min)"

{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname

//| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
//| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
///| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| timeslice //| where status !="Normal"
| count by status,_timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column status

{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname

| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| timeslice | where status !="Normal"
| count by name | sort _count

{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname


| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorPath" as path
| parse regex field=path "(?<folder>.+)\/[^\/]+" 

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| timeslice | where status !="Normal"
| count by folder | sort _count

panels.title: Warning, Error or Missing Data Events By Name Over Time

queries.queryString:
{{{filter}}}
_index=sumologic_system_events _sourceCategory=alerts 
| json field=_raw "details.monitorInfo.monitorId" as monitorid
| json field=_raw "details.name" as eventname

| json field=_raw "subsystem"
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.name" as name
| json field=_raw "resourceIdentity.id" as resourceid

| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.previousState" as previousstatus
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.currentState" as status
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.triggerValue" as value
| json field=_raw "details.alertingGroup.timeSeriesKey" as timeseries nodrop
| if (isempty(timeseries),"group",timeseries) as timeseries
| timeslice | where status !="Normal"
| count by name,_timeslice | transpose row _timeslice column name
